dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal God is said to hold within its massive body an enormous collection of information on the known world. Though similar to the World Tree it has stored the knowledge of the forest and the trees, it doesn't give off the same air of dignity that the World Tree does. However, compared to other Metal Gods it has a beautiful voice by which it fascinates Summoners with its profound words. There are some who say they even hold memories of songs sung long ago...
dictionary.summon:
Which do you want,
to hear me sing,
or to use me in fusion?
